attributes.action: Call on the Government to Allow an Annual National Day for all Students
attributes.additional_details: Education and higher education are important for building our nation. The annual U.K. nationwide freedom day should encourage all students to take part in events & raise issues they feel strongly about and to highlight the changes students want to see regarding tuition fees/financial matters, human rights, unfair discrimination, inequality, health matters, disability, environmental issues, etc. Importantly this will allow students to stand up for their rights.
attributes.background: The Government and Parliament should mark an annual day in the first week of July to be known as “Students Rights Freedom Project Day” a national day for all students to take part in & organise events/marches to raise awareness and express their views on important issues they feel strongly about.
